languages.text: "О, Великий, спасибо, что даровал Вольному Торговцу {mf|его|ее} священный Патент и привилегии! Если бы мне пришлось ждать еще хоть минутой дольше, видят небеса, я бы сегодя точно кого-нибудь пристрелила!"

traits.locale_text: "О, Великий, спасибо, что даровал Вольному Торговцу {mf|его|ее} священный Патент и привилегии! Если бы мне пришлось ждать еще хоть минутой дольше, видят небеса, я бы сегодя точно кого-нибудь пристрелила!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"
languages.original_text: "О, Великий, спасибо, что даровал Вольному Торговцу {mf|его|ее} священный Патент и привилегии! Если бы мне пришлось ждать еще хоть минутой дольше, видят небеса, я бы сегодя точно кого-нибудь пристрелила!"

traits.locale_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “噢，至高无上的神皇啊，感谢你赐予行商浪人神圣的授状与特权！我对天发誓，如果我们当时再多等一分钟，我肯定会开枪打人了！”
languages.original_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，至高无上的神皇啊，感谢你赐予行商浪人神圣的许可证与特权！我对天发誓，如果我们当时再多等一分钟，我肯定会开枪打人了！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Oh, Exaltado, gracias por otorgar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente su Patente sagrada con todos sus privilegios! ¡Si tuviera que haber esperado un minuto más, juro por el cielo que habría disparado a alguien!».
languages.original_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, Exaltado, gracias por otorgar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente su Patente sagrada con todos sus privilegios! ¡Si tuviera que haber esperado un minuto más, juro por el cielo que habría disparado a alguien!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンよ、自由開拓者に聖なる令状とあらゆる特権を与えてくれたことに感謝します！あと一分待たされてたら、間違いなく誰かを撃ち殺していましたわ！」
languages.original_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンよ、自由開拓者に聖なる令状とあらゆる特権を与えてくれたことに感謝します！あと一分待たされてたら、間違いなく誰かを撃ち殺していましたわ！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ô Exalté, merci du fond du cœur d'avoir accordé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} sa lettre de marque et tous les privilèges sacrés qui vont avec ! Si nous avions dû patienter encore une minute de plus, le ciel m'est témoin que j'aurais fini par tirer dans le tas ! »
languages.original_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"

traits.locale_text: « Ô Exalté, merci du fond du cœur d'avoir accordé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} sa lettre de marque et tous les privilèges sacrés qui vont avec ! Si nous avions dû patienter encore une minute de plus, le ciel m'est témoin que j'aurais fini par tirer dans le tas ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O Erhabener, danke, dass Ihr {mf|dem Freihändler seinen|der Freihändlerin ihren} heiligen Handelsbrief und all seine Privilegien gewährt habt! Hätten wir noch eine Minute länger warten müssen, der Himmel ist mein Zeuge, ich hätte jemanden erschossen!"
languages.original_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"

traits.locale_text: "O Erhabener, danke, dass Ihr {mf|dem Freihändler seinen|der Freihändlerin ihren} heiligen Handelsbrief und all seine Privilegien gewährt habt! Hätten wir noch eine Minute länger warten müssen, der Himmel ist mein Zeuge, ich hätte jemanden erschossen!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ey Görkemli, Hür Tacir'e o kutsal Ruhsatname'yi ve tüm imtiyazlarını bahşettiğin için sana şükürler olsun! Tek bir dakika daha beklememiz gerekseydi... Görkemli şahidim olsun ki şuracıkta birini vururdum!"
languages.original_text: "O, Exalted One, thank you for granting the Rogue Trader {mf|his|her} sacred Warrant and all its privileges! If we had had to wait a minute longer, heaven be my witness, I would have shot someone!"

traits.locale_text: "Ey Görkemli, Hür Tacir'e o kutsal Ruhsatname'yi ve tüm imtiyazlarını bahşettiğin için sana şükürler olsun! Tek bir dakika daha beklememiz gerekseydi... Görkemli şahidim olsun ki şuracıkta birini vururdum!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
